metadata.description: Service Tier: Free, Standalone, PerNode, or PerGB2018
Number of days of retention. Free plans can only have 7 days, Standalone and Log Analytics plans include 30 days for free
The location in which the resources should be deployed.

variables.Query0:
let results=SparkListenerEvent_CL
|  where  Event_s  contains "SparkListenerStageSubmitted"
| project 
Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d,Properties_spark_app_id_s,TimeGenerated,Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last 
| join kind= inner (
    SparkListenerEvent_CL
    |  where Event_s contains "SparkListenerStageCompleted"  
    | extend stageDuration=Stage_Info_Completion_Time_d - Stage_Info_Submission_Time_d
) on Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d;
results
 | extend slice = strcat(Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,"-",
Properties_spark_app_id_s," ",Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s) 
| extend stageDuration=Stage_Info_Completion_Time_d - Stage_Info_Submission_Time_d 
| summarize percentiles(stageDuration,10,30,50,90)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), slice
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last
variables.Query1:
let results=SparkListenerEvent_CL
|  where  Event_s  contains "SparkListenerStageSubmitted"
| project 
Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d,Properties_spark_app_id_s,TimeGenerated,Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last 
| join kind= inner (
    SparkListenerEvent_CL
    |  where Event_s contains "SparkListenerStageCompleted"  
) on Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d;
results
 | extend slice = strcat("# StagesCompleted ",Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,"-",
Properties_spark_app_id_s," ",Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s) 
| summarize StagesCompleted=count(Event_s) by bin(TimeGenerated,1m), slice
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last
variables.Query2:
let results=SparkListenerEvent_CL
|  where  Event_s  contains "SparkListenerStageSubmitted"
| project 
Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d,Properties_spark_app_id_s,TimeGenerated,Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last 
| join kind= inner (
    SparkListenerEvent_CL
    |  where Event_s contains "SparkListenerStageCompleted"  
) on Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d;
results
 | extend slice = strcat("# StagesCompleted ",Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,"-",
Properties_spark_app_id_s," ",Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s)
| extend slice=strcat(Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,"-",Properties_spark_app_id_s," ",Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s) 
| project Stage_Info_Number_of_Tasks_d,slice,TimeGenerated 
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last
variables.Query3:
let results = SparkMetric_CL
|  where name_s contains "executor.resultserializationtime" 
| extend sname=split(name_s, ".") 
| extend executor=strcat(sname[0],".",sname[1])
| project TimeGenerated , setime=count_d , executor ,name_s
| join kind= inner (
SparkMetric_CL
|  where name_s contains "executor.RunTime"
| extend sname=split(name_s, ".") 
| extend executor=strcat(sname[0],".",sname[1])
| project TimeGenerated , runTime=count_d , executor ,name_s
) on executor, TimeGenerated;
results
| extend serUsage=(setime/runTime)*100
| summarize SerializationCpuTime=percentile(serUsage,90) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m), executor
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last
| render timechart
variables.Query4:
let results=SparkMetric_CL
|  where  name_s  contains "executor.shuffleTotalBytesRead"
| extend sname=split(name_s, ".") 
| extend executor=strcat(sname[0],".",sname[1])
| summarize MaxShuffleWrites=max(count_d)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), executor 
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last 
| join kind= inner (
    SparkMetric_CL
    |  where name_s contains "executor.shuffleTotalBytesRead"
    | extend sname=split(name_s, ".") 
    | extend executor=strcat(sname[0],".",sname[1])
| summarize MinShuffleWrites=min(count_d)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), executor
) on executor, TimeGenerated;
results
| extend ShuffleBytesWritten=MaxShuffleWrites-MinShuffleWrites 
| summarize max(ShuffleBytesWritten)   by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), executor
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last
variables.Query5:
SparkListenerEvent_CL
| where Level contains "Error"
| project TimeGenerated , Message
variables.Query6:
let result=SparkListenerEvent_CL
| where  Event_s  contains "SparkListenerStageSubmitted"
| project Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d,Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s,Stage_Info_Submission_Time_d,Event_s,TimeGenerated,Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,Properties_spark_app_id_s
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last 
| join kind= inner (
    SparkListenerEvent_CL
    |  where Event_s contains "SparkListenerTaskEnd"
    | where Task_End_Reason_Reason_s contains "Success"
    | project Task_Info_Launch_Time_d,Stage_ID_d,Task_Info_Task_ID_d,Event_s,
              Task_Metrics_Executor_Deserialize_Time_d,Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Read_Metrics_Fetch_Wait_Time_d,
              Task_Metrics_Executor_Run_Time_d,Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Time_d,
              Task_Metrics_Result_Serialization_Time_d,Task_Info_Getting_Result_Time_d,
              Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Read_Metrics_Remote_Bytes_Read_d,Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Metrics_Shuffle_Bytes_Written_d,
              Task_Metrics_JVM_GC_Time_d,TimeGenerated
) on $left.Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d == $right.Stage_ID_d;
result
| extend schedulerdelay = Task_Info_Launch_Time_d - Stage_Info_Submission_Time_d
| extend name=strcat("SchuffleBytesWritten ",Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,"-",Properties_spark_app_id_s," ",Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s)
| summarize percentile(Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Metrics_Shuffle_Bytes_Written_d,90) by bin(TimeGenerated,1m),name
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last;
variables.Query7:
let result=SparkListenerEvent_CL
| where Event_s  contains "SparkListenerStageSubmitted"
| project Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d,Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s,Stage_Info_Submission_Time_d,Event_s,TimeGenerated,Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,Properties_spark_app_id_s
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last 
| join kind= inner (
    SparkListenerEvent_CL
    |  where Event_s contains "SparkListenerTaskEnd"
    | where Task_End_Reason_Reason_s contains "Success"
    | project Task_Info_Launch_Time_d,Stage_ID_d,Task_Info_Task_ID_d,Event_s,
              Task_Metrics_Executor_Deserialize_Time_d,Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Read_Metrics_Fetch_Wait_Time_d,
              Task_Metrics_Executor_Run_Time_d,Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Time_d,
              Task_Metrics_Result_Serialization_Time_d,Task_Info_Getting_Result_Time_d,
              Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Read_Metrics_Remote_Bytes_Read_d,Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Metrics_Shuffle_Bytes_Written_d,
              Task_Metrics_JVM_GC_Time_d,Task_Metrics_Input_Metrics_Bytes_Read_d,TimeGenerated
) on $left.Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d == $right.Stage_ID_d;
result
| extend name=strcat("InputBytesRead ",Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,"-",Properties_spark_app_id_s," ",Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s)
| summarize percentile(Task_Metrics_Input_Metrics_Bytes_Read_d,90) by bin(TimeGenerated,1m),name
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last;
variables.Query8:
SparkListenerEvent_CL
|  where Event_s contains "taskend" 
| extend taskDuration=Task_Info_Finish_Time_d-Task_Info_Launch_Time_d 
| summarize sum(taskDuration) by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), Task_Info_Host_s
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last
variables.Query9:
let results = SparkMetric_CL 
|  where name_s contains "executor.cpuTime" 
| extend sname=split(name_s, ".")
| extend executor=strcat(sname[0],".",sname[1])
| project TimeGenerated , cpuTime=count_d/1000000  ,  executor ,name_s
| join kind= inner (
    SparkMetric_CL
|  where name_s contains "executor.RunTime"
| extend sname=split(name_s, ".") 
| extend executor=strcat(sname[0],".",sname[1])
| project TimeGenerated , runTime=count_d  ,  executor ,name_s
) on executor, TimeGenerated;
results
| extend cpuUsage=(cpuTime/runTime)*100
| summarize ExecutorCpuTime = percentile(cpuUsage,90) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m), executor
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last
variables.Query10:
let results=SparkListenerEvent_CL
|  where  Event_s  contains "SparkListenerJobStart"
| project Job_ID_d,Properties_spark_app_id_s,Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,TimeGenerated
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last 
| join kind= inner (
    SparkListenerEvent_CL
    |  where Event_s contains "SparkListenerJobEnd"
    | where Job_Result_Result_s contains "JobSucceeded"
    | project Event_s,Job_ID_d,TimeGenerated
) on Job_ID_d;
results
| extend slice=strcat("#JobsCompleted ",Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,"-",Properties_spark_app_id_s)
| summarize count(Event_s)   by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m),slice
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last
variables.Query11:
let results=SparkMetric_CL
|  where  name_s  contains "executor.shuffleBytesWritten"
| extend sname=split(name_s, ".") 
| extend executor=strcat(sname[0],".",sname[1])
| summarize MaxShuffleWrites=max(count_d)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), executor 
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last 
| join kind= inner (
    SparkMetric_CL
    |  where name_s contains "executor.shuffleBytesWritten"
    | extend sname=split(name_s, ".") 
    | extend executor=strcat(sname[0],".",sname[1])
| summarize MinShuffleWrites=min(count_d)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), executor
) on executor, TimeGenerated;
results
| extend ShuffleBytesWritten=MaxShuffleWrites-MinShuffleWrites 
| summarize max(ShuffleBytesWritten)   by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), executor
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last
variables.DisplayName12: shuffle disk bytes spilled per executor
variables.Query12:
let results=SparkMetric_CL
| where  name_s  contains "executor.diskBytesSpilled"
| extend sname=split(name_s, ".") 
| extend executor=strcat("executorid:",sname[1])
| summarize MaxShuffleWrites=max(count_d)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), executor 
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last 
| join kind= inner (
    SparkMetric_CL
    | where name_s contains "executor.diskBytesSpilled"
    | extend sname=split(name_s, ".") 
    | extend executor=strcat("executorid:",sname[1])
| summarize MinShuffleWrites=min(count_d)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), executor
) on executor, TimeGenerated;
results
| extend ShuffleBytesWritten=MaxShuffleWrites-MinShuffleWrites 
| summarize any(ShuffleBytesWritten)   by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), executor
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last
variables.Query13:
let result=SparkListenerEvent_CL
| where Event_s  contains "SparkListenerStageSubmitted"
| project Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d,Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s,Stage_Info_Submission_Time_d,Event_s,TimeGenerated,Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,Properties_spark_app_id_s
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last 
| join kind= inner (
    SparkListenerEvent_CL
    |  where Event_s contains "SparkListenerTaskEnd"
    | where Task_End_Reason_Reason_s contains "Success"
    | project Task_Info_Launch_Time_d,Stage_ID_d,Task_Info_Task_ID_d,Event_s,
              Task_Metrics_Executor_Deserialize_Time_d,Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Read_Metrics_Fetch_Wait_Time_d,
              Task_Metrics_Executor_Run_Time_d,Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Time_d,
              Task_Metrics_Result_Serialization_Time_d,Task_Info_Getting_Result_Time_d,
              Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Read_Metrics_Remote_Bytes_Read_d,Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Metrics_Shuffle_Bytes_Written_d,
              Task_Metrics_JVM_GC_Time_d,TimeGenerated
) on $left.Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d == $right.Stage_ID_d;
result
| extend name=strcat("TaskShuffleReadTime ",Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,"-",Properties_spark_app_id_s," ",Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s)
| summarize percentile(Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Read_Metrics_Fetch_Wait_Time_d,90) by bin(TimeGenerated,1m),name
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last;
variables.Query14:
SparkMetric_CL
|  where  name_s  contains "shuffle-client.usedHeapMemory"
| extend sname=split(name_s, ".")
| extend executor=strcat(sname[0],".",sname[1])
| summarize percentile(value_d,90)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), executor
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last
variables.Query15:
let results=SparkListenerEvent_CL
| where  Event_s  contains "SparkListenerJobStart"
| project Job_ID_d,Properties_callSite_short_s,TimeGenerated
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last 
| join kind= inner (
    SparkListenerEvent_CL
    | where Event_s contains "SparkListenerJobEnd"
    | where Job_Result_Result_s !contains "JobSucceeded"
    | project Event_s,Job_ID_d,TimeGenerated
) on Job_ID_d;
results
| extend slice=strcat("JobErrors ",Properties_callSite_short_s)
| summarize count(Event_s)   by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m),slice
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last
variables.Query16:
let result=SparkListenerEvent_CL
| where  Event_s  contains "SparkListenerStageCompleted"
| project Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d,Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s,Event_s,TimeGenerated
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last 
| join kind= inner (
    SparkListenerEvent_CL
    | where Event_s contains "SparkListenerTaskEnd"
    | where Task_End_Reason_Reason_s !contains "Success"
    | project Stage_ID_d,Task_Info_Task_ID_d,Task_End_Reason_Reason_s,
              TaskEvent=Event_s,TimeGenerated
) on $left.Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d == $right.Stage_ID_d;
result
| extend slice=strcat("#TaskErrors ",Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s)
| summarize count(TaskEvent)  by bin(TimeGenerated,1m),slice
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last
variables.Query17:
SparkListenerEvent_CL
| where Event_s contains "queryprogressevent"
| extend sname=strcat(progress_name_s,"-","triggerexecution") 
| summarize percentile(progress_durationMs_triggerExecution_d,90)  by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m), sname
| order by  TimeGenerated   asc  nulls last
variables.Query18:
let result=SparkListenerEvent_CL
| where  Event_s  contains "SparkListenerStageCompleted"
| project Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d,Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s,Stage_Info_Submission_Time_d,Event_s,TimeGenerated
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last 
| join kind= inner (
    SparkListenerEvent_CL
    | where Event_s contains "SparkListenerTaskEnd"
    | where Task_End_Reason_Reason_s contains "Success"
    | project Task_Info_Launch_Time_d,Stage_ID_d,Task_Info_Task_ID_d,Event_s,
              Task_Metrics_Executor_Deserialize_Time_d,Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Read_Metrics_Fetch_Wait_Time_d,
              Task_Metrics_Executor_Run_Time_d,Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Time_d,
              Task_Metrics_Result_Serialization_Time_d,Task_Info_Getting_Result_Time_d,
              Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Read_Metrics_Remote_Bytes_Read_d,Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Metrics_Shuffle_Bytes_Written_d,
              Task_Metrics_JVM_GC_Time_d,TimeGenerated
) on $left.Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d == $right.Stage_ID_d;
result
| extend ShuffleWriteTime=Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Time_d/1000000
| extend name=strcat("TaskShuffleWriteTime ",Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s)
| summarize percentile(ShuffleWriteTime,90) by bin(TimeGenerated,1m),name
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last;
variables.Query19:
let result=SparkListenerEvent_CL
| where  Event_s  contains "SparkListenerStageSubmitted"
| project Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d,Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s,Stage_Info_Submission_Time_d,Event_s,TimeGenerated,Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,Properties_spark_app_id_s
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last 
| join kind= inner (
    SparkListenerEvent_CL
    |  where Event_s contains "SparkListenerTaskEnd"
    | where Task_End_Reason_Reason_s contains "Success"
    | project Task_Info_Launch_Time_d,Stage_ID_d,Task_Info_Task_ID_d,Event_s,
              Task_Metrics_Executor_Deserialize_Time_d,Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Read_Metrics_Fetch_Wait_Time_d,
              Task_Metrics_Executor_Run_Time_d,Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Time_d,
              Task_Metrics_Result_Serialization_Time_d,Task_Info_Getting_Result_Time_d,
              Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Read_Metrics_Remote_Bytes_Read_d,Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Metrics_Shuffle_Bytes_Written_d,
              Task_Metrics_JVM_GC_Time_d,Task_Metrics_Input_Metrics_Bytes_Read_d,TimeGenerated
) on $left.Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d == $right.Stage_ID_d;
result
| extend name=strcat("TaskDeserializationTime ",Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,"-",Properties_spark_app_id_s," ",Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s)
| summarize percentile(Task_Metrics_Executor_Deserialize_Time_d,90) by bin(TimeGenerated,1m),name
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last;
variables.Query20:
let result=SparkListenerEvent_CL
| where  Event_s  contains "SparkListenerStageSubmitted"
| project Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d,Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s,Stage_Info_Submission_Time_d,Event_s,TimeGenerated,Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,Properties_spark_app_id_s
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last  
| join kind= inner (
    SparkListenerEvent_CL
    |  where Event_s contains "SparkListenerTaskEnd"
    | where Task_End_Reason_Reason_s contains "Success"
    | project Task_Info_Launch_Time_d,Stage_ID_d,Task_Info_Task_ID_d,Event_s,
              Task_Metrics_Executor_Deserialize_Time_d,Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Read_Metrics_Fetch_Wait_Time_d,
              Task_Metrics_Executor_Run_Time_d,Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Time_d,
              Task_Metrics_Result_Serialization_Time_d,Task_Info_Getting_Result_Time_d,
              Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Read_Metrics_Remote_Bytes_Read_d,Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Metrics_Shuffle_Bytes_Written_d,
              Task_Metrics_JVM_GC_Time_d,TimeGenerated
) on $left.Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d == $right.Stage_ID_d;
result
| extend name=strcat("TaskResultSerializationTime ",Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,"-",Properties_spark_app_id_s," ",Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s)
| summarize percentile(Task_Metrics_Result_Serialization_Time_d,90) by bin(TimeGenerated,1m),name
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last;
variables.DisplayName21: file system bytes read per executor
variables.Query21:
SparkMetric_CL
|  extend sname=split(name_s, ".")
| extend executor=strcat(sname[0],".",sname[1])
| where  name_s  contains "executor.filesystem.file.read_bytes" 
| summarize FileSystemReadBytes=percentile(value_d,90)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), executor
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last 
| render timechart
variables.Query22:
SparkListenerEvent_CL
| where Event_s   contains "progress"
| extend sname=strcat(progress_name_s,"-ProcRowsPerSecond") 
| extend status = todouble(extractjson("$.[0].processedRowsPerSecond", progress_sources_s))
| summarize percentile(status,90) by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m) , sname
| order by  TimeGenerated   asc  nulls last
variables.Query23:
let results = SparkMetric_CL 
|  where name_s contains "executor.deserializetime" 
| extend sname=split(name_s, ".") 
| extend executor=strcat(sname[0],".",sname[1])
| project TimeGenerated , desetime=count_d , executor ,name_s
| join kind= inner (
SparkMetric_CL
|  where name_s contains "executor.RunTime"
| extend sname=split(name_s, ".") 
| extend executor=strcat(sname[0],".",sname[1])
| project TimeGenerated , runTime=count_d , executor ,name_s
) on executor, TimeGenerated;
results
| extend deseUsage=(desetime/runTime)*100
| summarize deSerializationCpuTime=percentiles(deseUsage,90) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m), executor
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last
variables.Query24:
let results=SparkListenerEvent_CL
|  where  Event_s  contains "SparkListenerStageSubmitted"
| project 
Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d,Properties_spark_app_id_s,TimeGenerated,Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last 
| join kind= inner (
    SparkListenerEvent_CL
    |  where Event_s contains "SparkListenerStageCompleted"  
) on Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d;
results
 | extend slice = strcat("# StagesCompleted ",Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,"-",
Properties_spark_app_id_s," ",Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s)
| extend slice=strcat(Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,"-",Properties_spark_app_id_s," ",Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s) 
| project Stage_Info_Number_of_Tasks_d,slice,TimeGenerated 
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last
variables.DisplayName25: file system bytes write per executor
variables.Query25:
SparkMetric_CL
|  extend sname=split(name_s, ".")
| extend executor=strcat(sname[0],".",sname[1])
| where  name_s  contains "executor.filesystem.file.write_bytes" 
| summarize FileSystemWriteBytes=percentile(value_d,90)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), executor
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last
variables.Query26:
let result=SparkListenerEvent_CL
| where  Event_s  contains "SparkListenerStageSubmitted"
| project Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d,Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s,Stage_Info_Submission_Time_d,Event_s,TimeGenerated,Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,Properties_spark_app_id_s
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last 
| join kind= inner (
    SparkListenerEvent_CL
    |  where Event_s contains "SparkListenerTaskEnd"
    | where Task_End_Reason_Reason_s contains "Success"
    | project Task_Info_Launch_Time_d,Stage_ID_d,Task_Info_Task_ID_d,Event_s,
              Task_Metrics_Executor_Deserialize_Time_d,Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Read_Metrics_Fetch_Wait_Time_d,
              Task_Metrics_Executor_Run_Time_d,Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Time_d,
              Task_Metrics_Result_Serialization_Time_d,Task_Info_Getting_Result_Time_d,
              Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Read_Metrics_Remote_Bytes_Read_d,Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Metrics_Shuffle_Bytes_Written_d,
              Task_Metrics_JVM_GC_Time_d,TimeGenerated
) on $left.Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d == $right.Stage_ID_d;
result
| extend schedulerdelay = Task_Info_Launch_Time_d - Stage_Info_Submission_Time_d
| extend name=strcat("SchedulerDelayTime ",Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,"-",Properties_spark_app_id_s," ",Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s)
| summarize percentile(schedulerdelay,90) , percentile(Task_Metrics_Executor_Run_Time_d,90) by bin(TimeGenerated,1m),name
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last;
variables.Query27:
SparkListenerEvent_CL
| extend slice = strcat("CountExceptions",progress_name_s) 
| where Level contains "Error"
| summarize count(Level) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m), slice
variables.Query28:
SparkMetric_CL
| where  name_s  contains "shuffle-client.usedDirectMemory"
| extend sname=split(name_s, ".")
| extend executor=strcat("executorid:",sname[1])
| summarize percentile(value_d,90)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), executor
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last
variables.Query29:
let results=SparkListenerEvent_CL
| where  Event_s  contains "SparkListenerJobStart"
| project Job_ID_d,Properties_spark_app_id_s,Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,
Submission_Time_d,TimeGenerated
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last 
| join kind= inner (
    SparkListenerEvent_CL
    | where Event_s contains "SparkListenerJobEnd"
    | where Job_Result_Result_s contains "JobSucceeded"
    | project Event_s,Job_ID_d,Completion_Time_d,TimeGenerated
) on Job_ID_d;
results
| extend slice=strcat(Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,"-",Properties_spark_app_id_s)
| extend jobDuration=Completion_Time_d - Submission_Time_d 
| summarize percentiles(jobDuration,10,30,50,90)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), slice
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last
variables.Query30:
let result=SparkListenerEvent_CL
| where Event_s  contains "SparkListenerStageSubmitted"
| project Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d,Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s,Stage_Info_Submission_Time_d,Event_s,TimeGenerated,Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,Properties_spark_app_id_s
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last
| join kind= inner (
    SparkListenerEvent_CL
    |  where Event_s contains "SparkListenerTaskEnd"
    | where Task_End_Reason_Reason_s contains "Success"
    | project Task_Info_Launch_Time_d,Stage_ID_d,Task_Info_Task_ID_d,Event_s,
              Task_Metrics_Executor_Deserialize_Time_d,Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Read_Metrics_Fetch_Wait_Time_d,
              Task_Metrics_Executor_Run_Time_d,Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Time_d,
              Task_Metrics_Result_Serialization_Time_d,Task_Info_Getting_Result_Time_d,
              Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Read_Metrics_Remote_Bytes_Read_d,Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Metrics_Shuffle_Bytes_Written_d,
              Task_Metrics_JVM_GC_Time_d,TimeGenerated
) on $left.Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d == $right.Stage_ID_d;
result
| extend name=strcat("ExecutorComputeTime ",Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,"-",Properties_spark_app_id_s," ",Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s)
| summarize percentile(Task_Metrics_Executor_Run_Time_d,90) by bin(TimeGenerated,1m),name
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last;
variables.Query31:
SparkListenerEvent_CL
| where Event_s   contains "progress"
| extend sname=strcat(progress_name_s,"-inputRowsPerSecond") 
| extend status = todouble(extractjson("$.[0].inputRowsPerSecond", progress_sources_s))
| summarize percentile(status,90) by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m) , sname
| order by  TimeGenerated   asc  nulls last
variables.Query32:
let result=SparkListenerEvent_CL
| where Event_s  contains "SparkListenerStageSubmitted"
| project Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d,Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s,Stage_Info_Submission_Time_d,Event_s,TimeGenerated,Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,Properties_spark_app_id_s
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last
| join kind= inner (
    SparkListenerEvent_CL
    |  where Event_s contains "SparkListenerTaskEnd"
    | where Task_End_Reason_Reason_s contains "Success"
    | project Task_Info_Launch_Time_d,Stage_ID_d,Task_Info_Task_ID_d,Event_s,
              Task_Metrics_Executor_Deserialize_Time_d,Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Read_Metrics_Fetch_Wait_Time_d,
              Task_Metrics_Executor_Run_Time_d,Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Time_d,
              Task_Metrics_Result_Serialization_Time_d,Task_Info_Getting_Result_Time_d,
              Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Read_Metrics_Remote_Bytes_Read_d,Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Write_Metrics_Shuffle_Bytes_Written_d,
              Task_Metrics_JVM_GC_Time_d,TimeGenerated
) on $left.Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d == $right.Stage_ID_d;
result
| extend name=strcat("SchuffleBytesRead ",Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,"-",Properties_spark_app_id_s," ",Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s)
| summarize percentile(Task_Metrics_Shuffle_Read_Metrics_Remote_Bytes_Read_d,90) by bin(TimeGenerated,1m),name
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last;
variables.DisplayName33: shuffle memory bytes spilled per executor
variables.Query33:
let results=SparkMetric_CL
|  where  name_s  contains "executor.memoryBytesSpilled"
| extend sname=split(name_s, ".") 
| extend executor=strcat(sname[0],".",sname[1])
| summarize MaxShuffleWrites=max(count_d)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), executor 
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last 
| join kind= inner (
    SparkMetric_CL
    |  where name_s contains "executor.memoryBytesSpilled"
    | extend sname=split(name_s, ".") 
    | extend executor=strcat(sname[0],".",sname[1])
| summarize MinShuffleWrites=min(count_d)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), executor
) on executor, TimeGenerated;
results
| extend ShuffleBytesWritten=MaxShuffleWrites-MinShuffleWrites 
| summarize any(ShuffleBytesWritten)   by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), executor
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last
variables.Query34:
let results = SparkMetric_CL
|  where name_s contains "executor.jvmGCTime" 
| extend sname=split(name_s, ".")
| extend executor=strcat(sname[0],".",sname[1])
| project TimeGenerated , jvmgcTime=count_d , executor ,name_s
| join kind= inner (
SparkMetric_CL
|  where name_s contains "executor.RunTime"
| extend sname=split(name_s, ".")
| extend executor=strcat(sname[0],".",sname[1])
| project TimeGenerated , runTime=count_d , executor ,name_s
) on executor, TimeGenerated;
results
| extend JvmcpuUsage=(jvmgcTime/runTime)*100
| summarize JvmCpuTime = percentile(JvmcpuUsage,90) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m), executor
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last
| render timechart
variables.Query35:
SparkMetric_CL
|  where name_s !contains "driver" 
| where name_s contains "executor"
| extend sname=split(name_s, ".")
| extend executor=strcat(sname[1]) 
| extend app=strcat(sname[0])
| summarize NumExecutors=dcount(executor)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m),app
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last
variables.DisplayName36: shuffle bytes read to disk per executor
variables.Query36:
let results=SparkMetric_CL
| where  name_s  contains "executor.shuffleRemoteBytesReadToDisk"
| extend sname=split(name_s, ".") 
| extend executor=strcat("executorid:",sname[1])
| summarize MaxShuffleWrites=max(count_d)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), executor 
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last 
| join kind= inner (
    SparkMetric_CL
    | where name_s contains "executor.shuffleRemoteBytesReadToDisk"
    | extend sname=split(name_s, ".") 
    | extend executor=strcat("executorid:",sname[1])
| summarize MinShuffleWrites=min(count_d)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), executor
) on executor, TimeGenerated;
results
| extend ShuffleBytesWritten=MaxShuffleWrites-MinShuffleWrites 
| summarize any(ShuffleBytesWritten)   by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), executor
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last
variables.Query37:
let result=SparkListenerEvent_CL
| where  Event_s  contains "SparkListenerStageSubmitted"
| project Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d,Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s,Properties_spark_app_id_s,Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,Event_s,TimeGenerated
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last 
| join kind= inner (
    SparkListenerEvent_CL
    |  where Event_s contains "SparkListenerTaskEnd"
    | where Task_End_Reason_Reason_s contains "Success"
    | project Task_Info_Launch_Time_d,Stage_ID_d,Task_Info_Task_ID_d,Event_s,
              Task_Info_Finish_Time_d
              ) on $left.Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d == $right.Stage_ID_d;
result
| extend TaskLatency =  Task_Info_Finish_Time_d - Task_Info_Launch_Time_d
| extend slice=strcat(Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,"-",Properties_spark_app_id_s,"-",Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s)
| summarize percentile(TaskLatency,90)  by bin(TimeGenerated,1m),slice
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last;
variables.Query38:
let result=SparkListenerEvent_CL
| where Event_s  contains "SparkListenerStageSubmitted"
| project Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d,Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s,Stage_Info_Submission_Time_d,Event_s,TimeGenerated,Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,Properties_spark_app_id_s
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last 
| join kind= inner (
    SparkListenerEvent_CL
    |  where Event_s contains "SparkListenerTaskEnd"
    | where Task_End_Reason_Reason_s contains "Success"
    | project Stage_ID_d,Task_Info_Task_ID_d,
              TaskEvent=Event_s,TimeGenerated
) on $left.Stage_Info_Stage_ID_d == $right.Stage_ID_d;
result
| extend slice=strcat("#TasksCompleted ",Properties_spark_databricks_clusterUsageTags_clusterName_s,"-",Properties_spark_app_id_s," ",Stage_Info_Stage_Name_s)
| summarize count(TaskEvent)  by bin(TimeGenerated,1m),slice
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last
variables.Query39:
SparkMetric_CL
|  where  name_s  contains "shuffle-client.usedDirectMemory"
| extend sname=split(name_s, ".")
| extend executor=strcat(sname[0],".",sname[1])
| summarize percentile(value_d,90)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), executor
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last
